Ini Saran Peneliti LIPI soal Dewan Pengawas KPK yang Akan Dipilih Jokowi
07 Nov 2019, 20:33 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Dewan Pengawas KPK akan dipilih langsung oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) tanpa melalui panitia seleksi (pansel). Peneliti LIPI Siti Zuhro menyarankan agar Jokowi memilih orang-orang yang tidak menimbulkan kontroversi di masyarakat.
"Berikan kepercayaan kepada masyarakat bahwa sosok-sosok yang diambil adalah bukan president man tapi orang-orang profesional yang akan melakukan fungsi pengawasan yang proper, yang akurat, dan bisa lah masyarakat itu mempercayakan itu. Meskipun masih ada syak wasangka, rasa curiga, rasa waswas dan sebagainya," kata Siti di kantor DN-PIM, Pejaten, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Menurut Siti, masyarakat saat ini tengah menunggu manuver Jokowi dalam menentukan Dewan Pengawas KPK. Karena itulah, Siti mengatakan Jokowi perlu memilih sosok yang berintegritas dan sesuai dengan kehendak masyarakat.
"Penunjukan sosok-sosok pengawas nanti ini adalah orang-orang yang merepresentasikan tentunya integritas atau kehendak dari masyarakat. Jadi yang ketika disebutkan, masyarakat tidak resisten, masyarakat tidak melawan, tidak jadi perdebatan, kontroversi, pro kontra. Kita harapkan seperti itu," ujar Siti.

This is a suggestion from a LIPI researcher about the KPK Supervisory Board that Jokowi will choose
07 Nov 2019, 20:33 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - The KPK Supervisory Board will be directly elected by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) without going through a selection committee (committee). LIPI researcher Siti Zuhro suggested that Jokowi choose people who did not cause controversy in the community.
"Give confidence to the public that the figures taken are not the president man but professional people who will carry out proper oversight functions, which are accurate, and the community can entrust it. Although there are still suspicions, suspicion, anxiety and so on, "said Siti in the DN-PIM office, Pejaten, South Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
According to Siti, the community is currently waiting for Jokowi's maneuver in determining the KPK Supervisory Board. For this reason, Siti said that Jokowi needs to choose someone with integrity and in accordance with the wishes of the community.
"The appointment of supervisor figures later are people who represent, of course, the integrity or will of the community. So when it is mentioned, the community is not resistant, the community does not oppose, does not become a debate, controversy, pros and cons. We expect it to be like that," he said. Siti
